     var settings = {
         language: 'es_ES',
         currencyCode: 'EUR',
									locale: null
     };
     var getLocale = function() {
         if ((settings.locale instanceof sgLocale) === false) {
             settings.locale = new sgLocale({
                 locale : settings.language,
                 currency: settings.currencyCode
             });
         }
         return settings.locale;
     };

     $(function() {
         FastClick.attach(document.body);
     });

       <div class="box profile-info"> 
        <h3 class="boxheading"><strong>La información de pago</strong><span class="extratext minor">Los campos con un asterisco (*) son obligatorios.</span></h3> 
        <div class="p19 clearfix"> 
         <div class="clearfix"> 
          <p> <label><input id="billingInfo" checked value="ON" name="billingInfo" type="checkbox" class="checkbox">La información de pago es la misma que la dada en la sección de Contacto.</label> </p> 
         </div> 
         <div class="clearfix" id="billingInfoWrap" style="display: none;"> 
          <ul class="contact-info clearfix"> 
           <li> <label for="billing_first_name" class="standardformlabel">Nombre*:</label> <input type="text" id="billing_first_name" name="billing_info[first_name]" value="" class="fleft input"> </li> 
           <li> <label for="billing_last_name" class="standardformlabel">Apellidos*:</label> <input type="text" id="billing_last_name" name="billing_info[last_name]" value="" class="fleft input"> </li>

mi sitio web</span> </label> <label> <input class="answer" type="checkbox" name="answer_5_34" id="answer_5_34" value="34" onclick="showHideTextField(this)"            </div> 
          </div> 
         </div> 
        </div> 
       </div> 
       <div class="end-of-order-section"> 
        <p> <label><input id="termsAbide" value="ON" name="termsAbide" type="checkbox" class="checkbox"> Acepto los Términos de servicio del Programa de Afiliados <a href="javascript:disablePopup(); OpenWindow( '/viewtos/affiliate_program',
                        '', 'scrollbars=yes,width=600,height=500' )">Condiciones de Servicio</a> y <a href="javascript:disablePopup(); OpenWindow( '/privacidad.htm',
                        '', 'scrollbars=yes,width=600,height=500' )">Política de privacidad</a>. </label> </p> 
        <p> <label> <input type="checkbox" class="checkbox" id="email_notifications" name="email_notifications" value="ON"> Deseo recibir las noticias de afiliado de SiteGround por correo electrónico.. </label> </p> <a href="javascript:;" onclick="submitForm();" class="extralarge_button bblue" id="submitButton">Submit</a> 
        <input style="visibility: hidden; width: 1px; height: 1px;" type="submit" value="Submit">

        </div>

    <script type="text/javascript">

var entityTooltips = {
    default: '',
    us: "Si tienes una identificación de impuestos de los Estados Unidos (SSN o ITIN), por favor, indíquenoslo. De lo contrario, proporciona tu número de identificación fiscal local. Si no se aplica este número, proporciona tu fecha de nacimiento en formato (MM-DD-AAAA).",
    uk: {
        vat: '',
        tax: 'Please provide your CRN (Company Registration Number).',
        pin: 'Please provide your NINO (National Insurance Number).',
        se: "Please provide the tax number related with your self-employed business. It can be either a CRN (if you have such registration) or your NINO (National Insurance Number).",
    },
    eu: {
        tax: "Para poder pagar tus comisiones necesitamos la información fiscal correcta y completa en todo momento. Si usted es un negocio, por favor envíe su número de identificación fiscal. En caso de ser individual, proporcione su número de identificación personal. Si se producen cambios, asegúrate de mantener esta información actualizada en tu área de afiliados.",
    }
}
var website='Tu sitio web*:';
var pleaseselect='-- Elija una opción --';
var euCountries = ["AT","BE","CY","CZ","DK","EE","FI","FR","DE","GR","GI","HU","IE","IT","LV","LT","LU","MT","NL","PL","PT","SK","SI","ES","SE","JE","GG","BG","RO","HR","GL","IM","GP","GF","MQ","RE","YT","MF","MC"];
var companyEntities = {"4":{"type":"ngo","title":"ONG \/ Otra entidad","obligatory":true},"2":{"title":"Company","obligatory":true},"5":{"title":"Aut\u00f3nomo","obligatory":false},"3":{"title":"Freelance \/ Profesional","obligatory":false},"6":{"title":"Individual\/sole proprietor or single-member LLC","obligatory":false},"7":{"title":"C Corporation","obligatory":true},"8":{"title":"S Corporation","obligatory":true},"9":{"title":"Asociaci\u00f3n con facultades","obligatory":true},"10":{"title":"Trust\/Estate","obligatory":true},"11":{"title":"LLC with C Corporation tax classification","obligatory":true},"12":{"title":"LLC with S Corporation tax classification","obligatory":true},"13":{"title":"LLC with Partnership tax classification","obligatory":true},"14":{"title":"Non-profit","obligatory":true},"15":{"title":"Resto Empresariales","obligatory":false}};

function haveStates(countryCode)
{
    haveStatesCountries = ['US', 'CA', 'ES', 'BQ', 'IT'];
    return haveStatesCountries.indexOf(countryCode) != -1;
}

function isCountryBanned()
{
    var post = new Object;
    post.country = getCountryCode();
    $.post( '/fastajax/order/country/iscountrybanned',
        post,
        function(data) {
            var parsedData =  jQuery.parseJSON(data);
            if(parsedData[0] == 1) {
                showNoticeCountryBanned(false);
                $('#submitButton').attr('onclick', '');
            } else {
                hideNoticeCountryBanned();
                $('#submitButton').attr('onclick', 'submitForm();');
            }
        }
    );
}

function isStateBanned()
{
    var post = new Object;
    post.country = $( '#country' ).val();
    post.state = $( '#state' ).val();
    $.post( '/fastajax/order/country/isstatebanned',
        post,
        function(data) {
            var parsedData =  jQuery.parseJSON(data);
            if(parsedData[0] == 1) {
                showNoticeCountryBanned(true);
            } else {
                hideNoticeCountryBanned();
            }
        }
    );
}

function hideNoticeCountryBanned()
{
    $('[name="country"]').removeClass('error');
    $('[name="state"]').removeClass('error');
    $('.bad_country').hide();
}

function showNoticeCountryBanned(isState)
{
    $('[name="country"]').addClass('error');
    if (isState) {
        $('[name="state"]').addClass('error');
    }

    $('.main_error ul li').remove();
    $('.main_error ul').append('<li>El programa de afiliados no está disponible en tu país en este momento.</li>');
    $('.main_error').show().addClass('bad_country');
    $('.main_error').show();
}

function hideNoticeEntityBanned()
{
    $('#entity_select').removeClass('error');
}

function showNoticeEntityBanned()
{
    $('#entity_select').addClass('error');

    $('.main_error ul li').remove();
    $('.main_error ul').append('<li>Según la ley española, los Freelancers (\"Resto Empresariales\") no pueden participar en nuestro programa de afiliados. Debes registrarte como Profesional autónomo (\"Profesionales\") o Empresa (\"Empresa\") para poder recibir nuestras comisiones.</li>');
    $('.main_error').show().addClass('bad_country');
}

function updateEntities()
{
    var countryCode = getCountryCode();
    var selectedEntity = null;
    var post = new Object;
    post.country_code = countryCode;

    $.post( '/fastajax/affiliate/entity/getall',
        post,
        function(data)
        {
            var parsedData =  jQuery.parseJSON(data);
            $('#entity_select').empty().append($('<option></option>').attr("value", "").text('-- Elija una opción --'));

            for(var i in parsedData)
            {
                if (i == selectedEntity)
                    $('#entity_select').append('<option value="'+i+'" selected> ' + parsedData[i].title + '</option>');
                else
                    $('#entity_select').append('<option value="'+i+'"> ' + parsedData[i].title + '</option>');
            }

            toggleVatRegistration();
            changeEntityType();
        }
    );
}

function updateStates( countryCode )
{
    var post = new Object;
    post.country_code = countryCode;
    var selectedState = null;

    $.post( '/fastajax/order/country/getstates',
            post,

            function(data)
            {
                var parsedData =  jQuery.parseJSON(data);
                $('#state').empty().append($('<option></option>').attr("value", "").text('-- Elija una opción --'));

                for(var i in parsedData)
                {
                    if (i == selectedState)
                        $('#state').append('<option value="'+i+'" selected> ' + parsedData[i] + '</option>');
                    else
                        $('#state').append('<option value="'+i+'"> ' + parsedData[i] + '</option>');
                }
            }
        );
}

function reloadStates()
{
    var countryCode = $("#country").val();
    if ( haveStates(countryCode) ) {
        $("#state").prop('disabled', false);
        updateStates(countryCode);
    } else {
        $("#state").empty();
        var option = $('<option></option>').attr("value", "XX").text("Fuera de EE.UU. y Canadá"),
            emptyOption = $('<option></option>').attr("value", "").text('-- Elija una opción --');

        $("#state").empty().append(emptyOption).append(option);

        if (countryCode) {
            $("#state").val('XX')
        }
    }
}

function reloadBillingStates()
{
    var countryCode = $("#billing_country").val();
    if (haveStates(countryCode)) {
        $("#billing_state").prop('disabled', false);
        updateBillingStates( countryCode );
    } else {
        $("#billing_state").empty();
        var option = $('<option></option>').attr("value", "XX").text("Fuera de EE.UU. y Canadá"),
            emptyOption = $('<option></option>').attr("value", "").text('-- Elija una opción --');
        $("#billing_state").empty().append(emptyOption).append(option);

        if (countryCode) {
            $("#billing_state").val('XX')
        }
    }
}


function updateBillingStates( countryCode )
{
    var post = new Object;
    post.country_code = countryCode;
    var selectedState = null;

    $.post( '/fastajax/order/country/getstates',
        post,

        function(data)
        {
            var parsedData =  jQuery.parseJSON(data);
            $('#billing_state').empty().append($('<option></option>').attr("value", "").text('-- Elija una opción --'));

            for(var i in parsedData) {
                if (i == selectedState)
                    $('#billing_state').append('<option value="' + i + '" selected> ' + parsedData[i] + '</option>');
                else
                    $('#billing_state').append('<option value="' + i + '"> ' + parsedData[i] + '</option>');
            }
        }
    );
}


$( document ).ready( function() {
    reloadStates();
    reloadBillingStates();
    var pcchecker = new  ExtPostCodeChecker($('#zip'), $('#country'), null, $('#state'));

    $('body').on('change', '.answerRadioButton', function() {
        var $this = $(this),
        $question = $this.parents('.js-question-wrapper');

        if ($question.data('name') === 'Affiliate Profile') {
            resetAllExtraQuestions();
        }

        $.each($this.closest('label').siblings(), function(n, e) {
            var conf = $(e).find('input').data('configuration');
            if (undefined != conf && undefined != conf.open_extra_fields) {
                $.each(conf.open_extra_fields, function(y, f) {
                    $('div[data-id="' + f + '"]').hide();
                });
            }
            if (undefined != conf && undefined != conf.open_text_field && conf.open_text_field) {
                $(e).find('textarea').val('');
                $(e).find('textarea').hide();
            }
        });
        var question = $this.closest('.tooltip').siblings('.question').first();
        var conf = $this.data('configuration');
        if (undefined == conf || undefined == conf.open_text_field || conf.open_text_field == false) {
            showhideBox($(question).attr('id'));
        }
    });

    $('body').on('change', '.answer', function() {
        var $this = $(this);
        var conf = $(this).data('configuration');
        if (undefined != conf && undefined != conf.open_extra_fields) {
            $.each(conf.open_extra_fields, function(y, f) {
                $('div[data-id="' + f + '"]').show();
            });
        }
        if (undefined != conf && undefined != conf.open_text_field && conf.open_text_field) {
            if($this.prop('checked') == false) {
                $this.siblings('textarea').hide();
            }
            else {
                $this.siblings('textarea').show();
            }
        }
    });

    function resetAllExtraQuestions () {
        var extraQuestionsAnswers = $('.js-question-wrapper[data-is-extra-question=1]').find('input');

        extraQuestionsAnswers.prop('checked', false);

        $.map(extraQuestionsAnswers, function (el) {
           var conf = $(el).data('configuration');
           if (undefined != conf && undefined != conf.open_text_field && conf.open_text_field) {
               $(el).siblings('textarea').val('').hide();
           }

           fillDropDown(el);
        });
    }

    });

$('#country').on('change', function(){
    isCountryBanned();
    updateEntities();
});
$('#state').on('change', isStateBanned);

$('#billing_country').on('change', function(){
    isCountryBanned();
    updateEntities();
});

$('#billingInfo').on('change', function () {
    $('#billingInfoWrap').toggle()
    updateEntities();
});

</script> 
   </section> 
  </div> 
  <section id="chat-popup" class="chat-popup background-wrap border-plus-shadow highspot" style="display: none;"> 
   <h2 class="title title--regular title--size-medium title--line-top-left title--weight-bold title--cap color-white title--subtitle-density-small mt20"> ¡Hola! </h2> 
   <div class="grid2 grid--gap-medium background-wrap"> 
    <div class="abstract-half-dot abstract-whole-dot--small-circle abstract-whole-dot--small-radius abstract-half-dot--top-circle abstract-half-dot--negative-right-circle"></div> 
    <div class="abstract-half-dot abstract-whole-dot--small-circle abstract-whole-dot--small-radius abstract-whole-dot--negative-bottom-circle abstract-half-dot--negative-left-circle"></div> 
    <p class="text text--size-medium color-white"> ¡Estaremos encantados de ayudarte a elegir el plan de hosting para tu proyecto! </p>

   </div> 
  </footer> 
  <script type="text/javascript">
var width = null;
var orientation = null;
var headerFixedClass = false;
var inPageVatStatus = false;
var vatSwitchInProgress = false;
var urlMappings = {
				'us': 'siteground.com',				'uk': 'siteground.co.uk',				'es': 'siteground.es',				'it': 'it.siteground.com',				'de': 'siteground.com',				'eu': 'siteground.com',				'au': 'siteground.com',				'la': 'es.siteground.com',				'ww': 'siteground.com'			};

var sCoRegionMapping = {
		'us': 'MWc9PQ==',		'uk': 'MEE9PQ==',		'es': 'MFE9PQ==',		'it': 'MUE9PQ==',		'de': 'MDBVPQ==',		'eu': 'MXc9PQ==',		'au': 'Mnc9PQ==',		'la': 'Mmc9PQ==',		'ww': 'MHc9PQ=='	};

function formatPriceHalfDown(value) {
	var exp = -2;
	value = +value;
	exp = +exp;
	type = 'round';

    	var difference = (parseFloat(value) * 100) - (Math.floor(value * 100));
	if (difference <= 0.5 && difference !== 0) {
		type = 'floor';
	}
    
	// If the value is not a number or the exp is not an integer...
	if (isNaN(value)) {
		return 0;
	}

	// Shift
	value = value.toString().split('e');
	value = Math[type](+(value[0] + 'e' + (value[1] ? (+value[1] - exp) : -exp)));
	// Shift back
	value = value.toString().split('e');
	value = +(value[0] + 'e' + (value[1] ? (+value[1] + exp) : exp));

	return value.toFixed(2);
}

function vatMultiply(string, multi)
{
    var number = getLocale().numberParser(string); // extract number from string
    var formatted = getLocale().numberFormatter(number * multi); // apply vat

				// replace numbers in initial string with the formated value
    return string.replace(
        getLocale().stripNonNumbers(string),
								formatted
				);
}

function toggleVatIncluded()
{
    if (vatSwitchInProgress)
        return;

    vatSwitchInProgress = true;

    var enabled = !inPageVatStatus;

    document.cookie = "includingVat=" + (enabled ? 1 : 0) + ";expires=0";

    var vatPercent = 21;

    var taxName = 'VAT';
	
    var multi = enabled ? ((vatPercent+100)/100) : 1/((vatPercent+100)/100);
    $('.vatPriceElement').
